casebody.data:
John GROVER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 24, 2018

Vishal K. Garg, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner John Grover's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn. App. 804, 194 A.3d 316 (2018), is denied.
